name: Meadowsweet Herbs
description: Offers a wide selection of bulk herbs, an essential oil bar, and tinctures. They emphasize natural and cruelty-free products and have a commitment to sustainability. Kelly Needs, who operates the business, is a trained Chinese herbalist

name: Live the Essential Oil Life – Nature's Best Kept Secret
description: Handcrafts small-batch products using natural ingredients and pure essential oils. They are members of the Made in Montana Certification program

name: Absaroka Pain and Rehab (Young Living Essential Oils)
description: Offers medical-grade supplements and essential oils for wellness and immune health
